name: Devil's Deadweight
description:
You'd think the job of a succubus would be easy... Lianna proves that theory wrong with being one of the only succubi of her age to have not allured a single person! After many tasks, Lucifer himself gives her one final task or she'll be working for him as his secretary...

Game made using the Ren'Py engine for RNDGAME Jam II.

Coding, art assets, and writing by SemiSinful

Music by Eric Matyas

www.soundimage.org

- updated the code to include a missing image
